content: sock-along took place in january 2021 full pattern with 3 lessons and video tutorials can be found here https //www yarnspirations com/patons-crochet-sock-along sizes to fit t u s women s shoe sizes s 4-6½ m 7-9½ l 10-12½ finished foot length s 9 23 cm m 10 25 5 cm l 11 28 cm knit version of sock-a-long can be found here 2 these crochet socks feature a stretchy slip_stitch rib cuff a reinforced heel and simple toe shaping pattern calls for 2 balls of patons kroy socks 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/slip-knit-socks
